programme.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Joe works for a hideous corporation, but everything changes when he goes on a journey around the world.

programme.title: Ladyhawke
programme.desc: Two lovers, cursed to live together yet apart as hawk and wolf, battle the evil bishop who transformed them.

programme.title: The Majestic
programme.desc: After screenwriter Peter develops amnesia in small-town 1951, he assumes the identity of a missing war hero.

programme.title: Overnight Delivery
programme.desc: They have 24 hours to stop a package, prevent a disaster ... and fall in love.

programme.title: True Stories
programme.desc: David Byrne whimsically pays homage to the mythical small Texas town of Virgil.

programme.title: Strange Brew
programme.desc: When a deranged Brewmeister plans to turn beer into a mind-control device, two friends must save the world.

programme.title: Monkey Trouble
programme.desc: Eva Gregory really wants a pet and bonds with a charming monkey, who brings trouble along the way.

programme.title: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
programme.desc: In 2087, a casino owner, his android bodyguard, and an aspiring singer run from a millionaire gangster.

programme.title: Chaos Theory
programme.desc: An obsessively organized man learns that he’s sterile … and that his daughter was fathered by his best friend.

programme.title: Hot to Trot
programme.desc: A hapless stockbroker meets a talking horse, and everything changes.

programme.title: Fandango
programme.desc: Five young men about to graduate from college, take one last trip before facing their lives as adults.

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: To win a woman's heart, Dylan kidnaps her terrier with plans to "find" the dog and convince her to date him.

programme.title: Mr. Nanny
programme.desc: When wrestler Hulk Hogan takes a job as a nanny, he must survive a possibly impossible job.
